name: Espresso
description: A rich and intense coffee with a strong flavor and a thick crema.

name: Cappuccino
description: A classic Italian coffee made with equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam.

name: Latte
description: A smooth and creamy coffee made with espresso and steamed milk.

name: Mocha
description: A delightful blend of espresso, steamed milk, chocolate, and whipped cream.

name: Americano
description: A simple yet bold coffee made by diluting espresso with hot water.

name: Iced Coffee
description: Chilled coffee served over ice, perfect for a refreshing pick-me-up.

name: French Press
description: A method of brewing coffee that results in a robust and full-bodied flavor.

name: Cold Brew
description: A smooth and less acidic coffee brewed with cold water over an extended period.
